name: Sweeten Village Vol. 1 - Signed by Creators
description: Sweeten Village is a quant little town, nestled in the woods. It's like something right out of a storybook. However, when the town's sweets begin to change into monsters, it's up to 8-year-old Sally, her dog Sammy and the other townsfolk to save the day. There is something sinister going on in Sweeten Village, something that threatens to make it not so sweet. Written by Brad Duncan and illustrated by Beck Seashols, Sweeten Village Vol. 1 covers the first three chapters of the duo's online comic, www.sweetenvillage.com. Books come signed by writer Brad Duncan and illustrator Beck Seashols. Items in stock on September 16. Product Details Paperback: 80 pages Language: English ISBN-10: 1479208841 ISBN-13: 978-1479208845 Product Dimensions: 9 x 6 x 0.2 inches Shipments to Kentucky will incur a 6% sales tax.
